data_table.description: Form 31 - Reproductive History -- age at menarche; history of menstrual irregularity and amenorrhea; history of menopausal symptoms; history of pregnancy, pregnancy outcomes, infertility; history of breast feeding; history of gynecologic and breast surgeries. This self-administered questionnaire was required for all OS participants.

variable.name: MENARCHE
variable.comment: How old were you when you had your first menstrual period (menses) ?

variable.name: MENSREG
variable.comment: During most of your life, were your periods regular; that is, did they occur about once a month? (Do not include any time when you were pregnant or taking birth control pills.)

variable.name: MENSREGA
variable.comment: How old were you when your periods first became regular? (Your best guess.) Sub-question of F31 V2 Q2 'Were periods regular'.

variable.name: MENOPSEA
variable.comment: How old were you when you last had regular menstrual bleeding (a period)? (Your best guess.) (If you are still having regular bleeding or periods, enter your current age.) Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: MENSWO1Y
variable.comment: Between the time you had your first period and your last period, did you ever go without any periods for at least one year? (Do not count times when you were pregnant or breastfeeding).

variable.name: MENSWOD
variable.description: Time between first and last period
variable.comment:
Between your first menstrual period and your last, all together, about how long did you go without having your period? (Again, do not count times when you were pregnant or breastfeeding.) (Mark one oval.) Sub-question of F31 V2 Q4 'One year without period'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: ANYMENSA
variable.comment: How old were you when you last had any menstrual bleeding? (If you are still having menstrual bleeding or periods, enter your current age.) Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: MENPSYMP
variable.comment: How old were you when you first had symptoms such as hot flashes or night sweats? (Your best guess.) Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: MENPSYAF
variable.comment:
How old were you when you first had symptoms such as hot flashes or night sweats? (Your best guess.) Sub-question of F31 V2 Q6 'Hot flashes or night sweats'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: MENPSYAL
variable.comment:
How old were you when you last had symptoms such as hot flashes or night sweats? (If you are still having symptoms such as hot flashes or night sweats, enter your current age.) Sub-question of F31 V2 Q6 'Hot flashes or night sweats'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: PREG
variable.comment: Have you ever been pregnant? It is very important that we know about all of your pregnancies, including live births, stillbirths, miscarriages, tubals (ectopics), and abortions.

variable.name: PREGNUM
variable.comment: How many times have you been pregnant? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7 'Ever been pregnant' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: PREG6M
variable.comment: Did you ever have a pregnancy that lasted at least six months? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7 'Ever been pregnant' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: PREG6MN
variable.comment:
How many of these pregnancies did you have? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7 'Ever been pregnant' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7.2 'Ever have full-term pregnancy' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: PREG6MAF
variable.comment:
How old were you at the end of the first of these pregnancies? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7 'Ever been pregnant' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7.2 'Ever have full-term pregnancy' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: PREG6MAL
variable.comment:
How old were you at the end of the last of these pregnancies? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7 'Ever been pregnant' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7.2 'Ever have full-term pregnancy' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: BRTHLIVN
variable.comment: How many live births did you have? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7 'Ever been pregnant' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: BRTHSTLN
variable.comment: How many still births (from a pregnancy lasting 6 months or more) did you have? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7 'Ever been pregnant' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MISCARYUNSPEC
variable.description: How many miscarriages or unspecified type of pregnancies
variable.comment: How many spontaneous miscarriages or other births that were not specified as a live birth, stillbirth, or tubal (ectopic) pregnancy. Computed from Form 31, questions 7.1, 7.6-7.9. Subtracted number of live births, stillbirths, miscarriages and ectopic pregnancies from total number of pregnancies. Added remainder to miscarriages. Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7 'Ever been pregnant' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: ECTPREG
variable.comment: How many tubal (ectopic) pregnancies did you have? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q7 'Ever been pregnant' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: NOCNCEIV
variable.comment: Have you ever tried to become pregnant for more than 1 year without becoming pregnant?

variable.name: NOCNCVDR
variable.comment:
Did you visit a doctor or clinic because you didn't get pregnant? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8 'Tried becoming pregnant > 1 yr' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: NOCNCVR
variable.comment:
Was a reason found for why you did not become pregnant? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8 'Tried becoming pregnant > 1 yr' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.1 'Saw doctor because you...'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: NOCNCVHR
variable.comment:
What was the reason you did not become pregnant? (Mark all that apply.) Problem with your hormones or ovulation (producing eggs) Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8 'Tried becoming pregnant > 1 yr' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.1 'Saw doctor because you...'.
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.2 'Reason found for non-pregnancy'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: NOCNCVUT
variable.comment:
What was the reason you did not become pregnant? (Mark all that apply.) Problem with your tubes or uterus. Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8 'Tried becoming pregnant > 1 yr' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.1 'Saw doctor because you...'.
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.2 'Reason found for non-pregnancy'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: NOCNCVEN
variable.comment:
What was the reason you did not become pregnant? (Mark all that apply.) Endometriosis Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8 'Tried becoming pregnant > 1 yr' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.1 'Saw doctor because you...'.
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.2 'Reason found for non-pregnancy'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: NOCNCVOT
variable.comment:
What was the reason you did not become pregnant? (Mark all that apply.) Other problem with you. (Specify) Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8 'Tried becoming pregnant > 1 yr' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.1 'Saw doctor because you...'.
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.2 'Reason found for non-pregnancy'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: NOCNCVPT
variable.comment:
What was the reason you did not become pregnant? (Mark all that apply.) Problem in your partner. Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8 'Tried becoming pregnant > 1 yr' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.1 'Saw doctor because you...'.
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.2 'Reason found for non-pregnancy'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: NOCNCVDK
variable.comment:
What was the reason you did not become pregnant? (Mark all that apply.) Don't know. Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8 'Tried becoming pregnant > 1 yr' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.1 'Saw doctor because you...'.
Sub-question of F31 V2 Q8.2 'Reason found for non-pregnancy'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: BRSTFEED
variable.comment: Did you breastfeed or nurse any children for at least one month?

variable.name: BRSTFDN
variable.comment: How many children did you breastfeed? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q9 'Breastfeed at least one month'.

variable.name: BRSTFDAF
variable.comment: How old were you when you first breastfed a child? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q9 'Breastfeed at least one month'.

variable.name: BRSTFDAL
variable.comment: How old were you when you last breastfed a child? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q9 'Breastfeed at least one month'.

variable.name: BRSTFDM
variable.comment: Thinking aboout all the children you breastfed, how many months total did you breastfeed? (Your best guess.) Sub-question of F31 V2 Q9 'Breastfeed at least one month'.

variable.name: OOPH
variable.comment: Did you ever have an operation to have one or both of your ovaries taken out? (Mark one oval.)
variable.value: Yes, part of an ovary was taken out

variable.name: OOPHA
variable.comment: How old were you when you had your last operation to remove an ovary? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q10 'One or both ovaries removed'.

variable.name: TUBTIED
variable.comment: Did you ever have an operation to have your tubes tied to prevent pregnancy?

variable.name: TUBTIEDA
variable.comment: How old were you when you had your tubes tied? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q11 'Ever had tubes tied'.

variable.name: NEDLASP
variable.comment: Have you ever had a needle aspiration (where a doctor puts a needle in a lump in your breast and withdraws fluid or material)? Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: NEDLASPA
variable.comment:
How many of these needle aspirations have you had? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q12 'Needle aspiration ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: BRSTBIOP
variable.comment: Have you ever had a breast biopsy (where a doctor removes part or all of breast lump to check for cancer)? Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: BRSTBION
variable.comment:
How many of these biopsies have you had? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q13 'Breast biopsy ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: BRSTAUG
variable.comment: Did you ever have an operation to increase your breast size (breast augmentation) or have breast reconstruction using a breast implant?

variable.name: BRSTAUGA
variable.comment: How old were you when you first had breast augmentation? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q14 'Operation to increase breast'.

variable.name: BRSTAUGS
variable.comment: Was it for the right breast, left breast or both? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q14 'Operation to increase breast'.

variable.name: BRSTIMP
variable.comment: What type of breast implant did you receive? Sub-question of F31 V2 Q14 'Operation to increase breast'.

variable.name: BRSTOPOT
variable.comment: Have you ever had any other operations on your breasts? Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: BRSTPREM
variable.comment:
What type of other breast operations did you have? (Mark all that apply.) Removal of part of breast or breast reduction Sub-question of F31 V2 Q15 'Any other breast operations'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: BRSTREM
variable.description: Removal of one or both breasts
variable.comment:
What type of other breast operations did you have? (Mark all that apply.) Removal of one breast or Removal of both breasts. Sub-question of F31 V2 Q15 'Any other breast operations'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: BRSTREMO
variable.comment:
What type of other breast operations did you have? (Mark all that apply.) Other (Specify) Sub-question of F31 V2 Q15 'Any other breast operations'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 31.

variable.name: GRAVID
variable.comment: Computed from Form 31, questions 7 and 7.1. Number of times the participant has ever been pregnant.

variable.name: PARITY
variable.comment: Computed from Form 31, questions 7, 7.6 and 7.7. Number of pregnancies lasting at least 6 months. Equals -1 if never pregnant.

variable.name: FULLTRMR
variable.comment: Computed from Form 31, questions 7.2, 7.6 and 7.7. Indicator variable of whether the participant has ever had a full-term (lasting at least six months) pregnancy. Missing if never pregnant.

variable.name: NUMLIVER
variable.comment: Computed from Form 31, questions 7 and 7.6. Categorical variable of number of live births. Equals -1 if never pregnant.

variable.name: AGEFBIR
variable.comment: Computed from Form 31, questions 7, 7.2, and 7.4. Categorization of age at the end of first full-term (at least 6 months) pregnancy for participants who have ever been pregnant. Set to zero if participant has been pregnant but never had a full-term pregnancy.

variable.name: BOOPH
variable.comment: Computed from Form 31, question 10. Indicator for whether participant has had both ovaries taken out (bilateral oopherectomy).

variable.name: BRSTFDMO
variable.comment: Computed from Form 31, questions 9 and 9.4. Total number of months breastfed or nursed children for at least one month. Set to zero if participant never breastfed or has never been pregnant.

variable.name: BRSTDIS
variable.comment: Computed from Form 31, questions 13 and 13.1; Form 2, question 10; and Form 30, question 12.1. History of benign breast disease derived from number of breast biopsies. If a participant has a history of breast cancer recorded on either Form 2 or Form 30, BRSTDIS is set to missing.

variable.name: MENO
variable.comment: Age at which participant went through menopause. Computed using Form 31, questions 5, 6.1, 10, 10.1; Form 2, questions 7, 18, 18.2; Form 43 (age first used HRT).
